name: Constant degradation rate, 100% adoption by 2050, linear
description: The TLA_Envelope sheet was used to compute the annual degradation of the wetland.  The annual protection rate was adjusted so that 100% of the remaining wetlands in 2050 were protected.  This adoption is less than 100% of the wetlands in 2014.

name: Constant degradation rate, 80% adoption by 2050, linear
description: The TLA_Envelope sheet was used to compute the annual degradation of the wetland.  The annual protection rate was adjusted so that 80% of the remaining wetlands in 2050 were protected.  This is the same as Scenario 1 except for a smaller percentage protected by 2050.

name: Constant degradation rate, 100% adoption by 2030, linear
description: The TLA_Envelope sheet was used to compute the annual degradation of the wetland.  The annual protection rate was adjusted so that 100% of the remaining wetlands in 2030 were protected.  Because there is 100% protection in 2030, all values after that are constant.

name: Constant degradation rate, 80% adoption by 2030, linear
description: The TLA_Envelope sheet was used to compute the annual degradation of the wetland.  The annual protection rate was adjusted so that 80% of the remaining wetlands in 2030 were protected.  Because there is only 80% protection in 2030 linear interpolation was used to bridge the 2014, 2030, and 2050 values.

name: Variable degradation rate, 100% adoption by 2050, linear
description: The TLA_Envelope sheet was used to compute the annual degradation of the wetland.  The annual protection rate was adjusted so that 100% of the remaining wetlands in 2050 were protected.  This adoption is less than 100% of the wetlands in 2014.  This is the same as Scenario 1 except an annual reduction in degradation rate is applied.

name: Variable degradation rate, 80% adoption by 2050, linear
description: The TLA_Envelope sheet was used to compute the annual degradation of the wetland.  The annual protection rate was adjusted so that 80% of the remaining wetlands in 2050 were protected.  This is the same as Scenario 5 except for a smaller percentage protected by 2050.

name: Variable degradation rate, 100% adoption by 2030, linear
description: The TLA_Envelope sheet was used to compute the annual degradation of the wetland.  The annual protection rate was adjusted so that 100% of the remaining wetlands in 2030 were protected.  Because there is 100% protection in 2030, all values after that are constant. This is the same as Scenario 3 except a variable degradation rate is used.

name: Variable degradation rate, 80% adoption by 2030, linear
description: The TLA_Envelope sheet was used to compute the annual degradation of the wetland.  The annual protection rate was adjusted so that 80% of the remaining wetlands in 2030 were protected.  Because there is only 80% protection in 2030 linear interpolation was used to bridge the 2014, 2030, and 2050 values.  This scenario is the same as Scenario 4 except a variable degradation rate is used.
